doc.title: 01412 pasasingeum
doc.plot: Champion 'Starcraft' player, Young-won is given a CD which contains a new game. This is no ordinary game. Instead it seems like a real world. He eventually meets the other players who enter through internet room 01412 and together they embark on a quest for a magic sword.

Champion 'Starcraft' player, Young-won is given a CD which contains a new game. This is no ordinary game. Instead it seems like a real world. He eventually meets the other players who enter through internet room 01412 and together they embark on a quest for a magic sword.
